description: One of the very first pieces of clothing you’re likely to put on is also one of the most important because it sets the tone for how comfortable you’ll feel all day. With features designed to help eliminate chafing and provide support, Men's Everyday Exploration Merino Boxer Brief is designed to ensure that you will feel great—or at least, your underwear will.
name: Smartwool Merino Hemp Blend Boxer Brief - Mens
